sentences: Gerry Kassia Dialungana (1951 - 2 February 2002), was a Congo music recording artist and solo guitarist, in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC).
He was once a member of the soukous band TPOK Jazz, led by Fran√ßois Luambo Makiadi, which dominated the Congolese music scene from the 1950s through the 1980s.
